resources.string: \t \t Wonderla Holidays, is one of the largest amusement park operator in India. Wonderla Holidays Limited currently operates 3 amusement parks in Kochi, Bengaluru and Hyderabad respectively. It offers a variety of rides for all ages to enjoy, some of their rides are Recoil, Maverick, Y-Scream, and their latest addition Mission interstellar.
